page.title: 13Clubs in St. Andrews
page.content: In St. Andrews, there are clubs for people of all ages, such as Guides, Gymnastics and Ballet for girls and Scouts, Football and Rugby for boys. There are also clubs for both boys and girls such as Tennis, Byre Theatre Drama Group, Step Rock Swimming Club and an Athletics Club. For adults there are night classes such as Keep Fit, Swimming and Crafts. Most of the clubs are run by adult volunteers and most of them are held in school buildings or school grounds. Most of the club activities take place in the evening.
